name: jsorolla
description: JSorolla is a JavaScript library for biological and genomic data visualization.

scripts.build-genome-browser-demo: for i in `ls src/genome-browser/demo`; do cat src/genome-browser/demo/$i | sed 's/..\/..\/..\/node_modules/vendors/' | sed 's/..\/..\/..\/dist/dist/' | sed 's/..\/webcomponent\//webcomponent\//'> build/genome-browser/$i; done
scripts.build-genome-browser: mkdir -p build/genome-browser/vendors && npm run build-genome-browser-demo && cp -r dist src/genome-browser/webcomponent build/genome-browser && cp -r node_modules/jquery node_modules/qtip2 node_modules/urijs node_modules/cookies-js node_modules/crypto-js node_modules/underscore node_modules/backbone node_modules/font-awesome node_modules/@webcomponents node_modules/@polymer build/genome-browser/vendors
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run dist && npm run build-genome-browser
scripts.core: mkdir -p dist/js/core && cd src/core && cat *.js cache/*.js webcomponents/*.js webcomponents/opencga/variant/*.js clients/*.js data-source/*.js visualisation/*.js data-adapter/feature-adapter.js data-adapter/cellbase-adapter.js data-adapter/opencga-adapter.js data-adapter/feature-template-adapter.js widgets/*.js > ../../dist/js/core/core.js && cd ../.. && node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs dist/js/core/core.js -o dist/js/core/core.min.js && npm run webcomponents
scripts.genome-browser: mkdir -p dist/js/genome-browser && cd src/genome-browser && cp -r webcomponent ../../dist/js/genome-browser && cat *.js renderers/renderer.js renderers/*-renderer.js tracks/feature-track.js tracks/gene-track.js tracks/alignment-track.js tracks/variant-track.js tracks/tracklist-panel.js > ../../dist/js/genome-browser/genome-browser.js && cd ../.. && node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs dist/js/genome-browser/genome-browser.js -o dist/js/genome-browser/genome-browser.min.js
scripts.dist: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/js && npm run core && npm run genome-browser && npm run styles
